entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
